docs.title: task2: Prioritized unblocking on synchronisation primitives
task4 & 5:
docs.text:
priority donation

so first, we need to figure out which thread waits for which

and record the donations(possibly in an array of structs)

so if we are implementing this for locks, we should do

if the thread is holding the lock, we record this thread

get the current thread at everytick, if no donations happen during this lock, we add a donation

then after the lock, we restore the donation

so basically what we are altering is just a list of donations

so we alter the structs

C
/* Lock. */
struct lock 
  {
    struct thread *holder;      /* Thread holding lock (for debugging). */
    struct semaphore semaphore; /* Binary semaphore controlling access. */

    /* New struct member introduced for priority donations */
    struct list_elem elem;
  };
C
/* A counting semaphore. */
struct semaphore 
  {
    unsigned value;             /* Current value. */
    struct list waiters;        /* List of waiting threads. */

    /* New struct member for priority donations */
    struct thread *next;        /* Next thread to wake up. */
  };

everytime we call lock_acquire() we add a donation like this

C
/* Acquires LOCK, sleeping until it becomes available if
   necessary.  The lock must not already be held by the current
   thread.

   This function may sleep, so it must not be called within an
   interrupt handler.  This function may be called with
   interrupts disabled, but interrupts will be turned back on if
   we need to sleep. */
void
lock_acquire (struct lock *lock)
{
  ASSERT (lock != NULL);
  ASSERT (!intr_context ());
  ASSERT (!lock_held_by_current_thread (lock));

  enum intr_level old_level = intr_disable ();
  struct thread *cur = thread_current ();
  /* Donates priority to the lock's holder if any. */
  cur->donating_thread = lock->holder;
  if (lock->holder != NULL
      && (lock->semaphore.next == NULL 
          || cur->effective_priority > lock->semaphore.next->effective_priority))
  // if the lock has a holder, and the effective_priority if greater than the largest effective_priority in the queue
    donate_thread_priority (lock->holder, cur->effective_priority);
  intr_set_level (old_level);
  sema_down (&lock->semaphore);
  old_level = intr_disable ();
  /* Locked acquired, so no more donating thread. */
  cur->donating_thread = NULL;
  lock->holder = cur;
  /* Add the lock to current thread's LOCKS list. */
  list_push_back (&cur->locks, &lock->elem);
  intr_set_level (old_level);
}

we do this for donations, donations are here just to prevent priority inversion

C
/* Donate priority to a thread. */
void
donate_thread_priority (struct thread *t, int priority)
{
  ASSERT (t != NULL);

  if (priority > t->effective_priority) {
    /* Update effective priority if the donated priority is larger. */
    t->effective_priority = priority;
    /* Reinsert the thread into READY_LIST if it is ready. */
    if (t->status == THREAD_READY)
      reinsert_thread (t);
    /* Nested priority donation. */
    if (t->donating_thread != NULL)
      donate_thread_priority (t->donating_thread, priority);
    /* If thread is waiting for a sema_up,
       update the semaphore's next thread to be woken up. */
    if (t->waiting_sema != NULL &&
        t->waiting_sema->next->effective_priority < t->effective_priority)
      t->waiting_sema->next = t;
  }
}

so nested donations would be something like this

the list of the locks and semaphore is also ordered, so whenever we call sema->next, it refers to the one with the highest effective_priority

docs.title: task6:FPU
docs.text:
so we have two sets of variable - integers: priority, nice, ready_threads - real_numbers: recent_cpu load_avg

pintos does not support floating-point arithmetic

treat the rightmost bits of an integer as representing a fraction

so if 32bit int, the lowest 14 can be fractions, so we get \(\frac{x}{2^{14}}\), so 17 bit for the numerator, 1 for sign, the rest for denominator

  • \(f = 2^q\) where p,q are in fixed-point format, p+q = 31, f = 1 << q
  • integer n to fixed-point \(n * f\)
  • fixed-point x to integer(round towards zero) \(x / f\)
  • convert x to integer(round to nearest) \(\begin{cases}\begin{array}{c}\frac{(x + \frac{f}{2})}{f} & x\ge 0\\\frac{(x - \frac{f}{2})}{f} & x\le 0\end{array}\end{cases}\)
  • add fixed-point x and fixed-point y: \(x+y\)
  • subtract fixed-point y from fixed-point x: \(x-y\)
  • add fixed-point and integer n: \(x + n * f\)
  • subtract integer n from fixed-point x: \(x - n * f\)
  • multiply fixed point x by fixed-point y: \(((int64_t)x) * y / f\)
  • multiply fixed point x by integer n : \(x * n\)
  • divide fixed-point x by fixed-point y: \(((int64_t)x) * f / y\)
  • divide fixed-point x by integer n: \(x / n\)

so then, following the instructions, we do

C
#ifndef FIXED_POINT_H
#define FIXED_POINT_H

/* Fixed-Point Real Arithmetic */
#include <stdint.h>

/* We designate lowest 14 bits as fractional bits */
// altered by hongleigu, restore if needed
#define q 14 // this should be the digits of the fractions
#define F (1 << q);
// altering end
typedef int fp; /* type alias fixed point number */

/* n is an integer */
/* Convert n to fixed point */
inline fp int_to_fp(int n) {
  return n * F;
}

/* Convert x to integer (rounding toward zero) */
inline int fp_to_int_round_to_zero(fp x) {
  return x / F;
}

/* Convert x to integer (rounding to nearest) */
inline int fp_to_int_round_to_nearest(fp x) {
  return (x >= 0) ? (x + F / 2) / F : (x - F / 2) / F;
}

/* Add x and y where x and y are fixed-point */
inline fp add_fps(fp x, fp y) {
  return x + y;
}

/* Subtract y from x where y and x are fixed-point */
inline fp sub_fps(fp x, fp y) {
  return x - y;
}

/* Add x and n where x is fixed-point and n is integer */
inline fp add_fp_int(fp x, int n) {
  return x + n * F;
}

/* Subtract n from x where n is integer and x is fixed-point */
inline fp sub_fp_int(fp x, int n) {
  return x - n * F;
}

/* Multiply x by y where x and y are fixed-point */
inline fp mul_fps(fp x, fp y) {
  return ((int64_t) x) * y / F;
}

/* Multiply x by n where x is fixed-pont and n is integer */
inline fp mul_fp_int(fp x, int n) {
  return x * n;
}

/* Divide x by y where x and y are fixed-point */
inline fp div_fps(fp x, fp y) {
  return ((int64_t) x) * F / y;
}

/* Divide x by n where x is fixed-point and n is integer */
inline fp div_fp_int(fp x, int n) {
  return x / n;
}

#endif //FIXED_POINT_H

this is not hard actually, just cumbersome

docs.title: task7:BSD scheduler
docs.text:
so it just do one thing

  • priority argument to thread_create, thread_get/set_priority should be ignored

so basically we should ignore these and update all the recent_cpu and load_avg stuff inorder to pass the mlfqs tests(maybe TDD, we can see the sample result for mlfqs-recent-1)

first of all, all these must be done under mlfqs environment, so we do an if statement before that

the recent_cpu need to be updated every physical second, so thats ticks * TIMER_FREQ, where TIMER_FREQ is set to 100 by default

we alter the thread_tick function(actually the timer_interrupt will also do, they are basically the same)

C
void
thread_tick (void) 
{
  struct thread *t = thread_current();
  /* Update statistics. */
  /* adding BSD scheduler related code */
  /* Each time a timer interrupt occurs,
    recent_cpu is incremented by 1 for the running thread only,
    unless the idle thread is running.
  */
  if (t == idle_thread)
    idle_ticks++;
  else {
#ifdef USERPROG
  if (t->pagedir != NULL)
    user_ticks++;
  else
#endif
    kernel_ticks++;

    t -> recent_cpu = add_fp_int(t->recent_cpu, 1);
    }
    /* Once per second after system boot, load_avg is updated according to the formual */
    /* Once per second the value of recent_cpu is recalcualted for every thread,
     whether running, ready, or blocked using the formula
   */
// mycode starts task1 subtask6&7 hongleigu
  if (thread_mlfqs) {
    if (timer_ticks() % TIMER_FREQ == 0) {
      thread_mlfqs_update_recent_cpu_and_load_avg(t);
      // thread_foreach(update_recent_cpu, NULL);
    } else if (timer_ticks() % TIME_SLICE == 0){
      // the spec says do it as necessary
      // lets just do every time slice
      thread_mlfqs_update_priority(t);
    }
  }
//
  /* Enforce preemption. */
  if (++thread_ticks >= TIME_SLICE)
    intr_yield_on_return ();
}

we also do the addition to recent_cpu first

the addition update_priority happens when the threads need to update priority with

\(\text{priority} = \text{PRI_MAX} - (\text{recent_cpu} /4) - (nice * 2)\)

so from this we can infer that whenever recent_cpu and nice change, we should update the priority, also, we should do the updating every time slice just in case the testing program changes priority at some time but we did not update

that is the reason of the stuff in the else statement

but notice these two functions are yet to implement

we will do recent_cpu and load_avg first

load_avg is simple

\(\text{load_avg} = \frac{59}{60}*\text{load_avg} + \frac{1}{60}*\text{ready_threads}\)

just get the length of the list, do multiplication and done

but recent_cpu does nasty things

\(\text{rencent_cpu} = \frac{2*\text{load_avg}}{2*\text{load_avg} + 1} * \text{recent_cpu} + nice\)

the nice is nasty

you can do \(\text{recent_cpu} = (1-\frac{1}{2*\text{load_avg}}\text{recent_cpu} + nice\)

but we will fix to the spec

so we have

C
void
thread_mlfqs_update_recent_cpu_and_load_avg(struct thread* t)
{
  int ready_threads = list_size(&ready_list);
  if (t != idle_thread) ready_threads++;
  /* formula: load_avg =  (59/60)*load_avg + (1/60)*ready_threads; */
  load_avg = add_fps(mul_fps(c1, load_avg), mul_fp_int(c2, ready_threads));

  struct list_elem *x;
  for (x = list_begin(&all_list); x != list_end(&all_list); x = list_next(x)) {
    struct thread *t = list_entry(x, struct thread, allelem);
    /* Except DYING, the other status are running, ready, and blocked */
    if (t->status != THREAD_DYING) {
      /* number used in the calculation for recent cpu*/
      fp u = mul_fp_int(load_avg, 2);
      fp x = div_fps(u, add_fp_int(u, 1));
      fp y = mul_fps(x, t->recent_cpu);
      t->recent_cpu = add_fp_int(y, t->nice); /* Effciency here may be improved?! */
    }
  }
}

what a pity we cannot use the thread_foreach because this is about allelem, not elem

so then we update the priority

C
// mycode ends

// mycode starts: task1 subtask6&7 hongleigu
/* Update priority. */
void
thread_mlfqs_update_priority (struct thread* t)
{
  if (t == idle_thread)
    return;

  ASSERT (thread_mlfqs);
  ASSERT (t != idle_thread);

  t->priority = fp_to_int_round_to_nearest(sub_fp_int(sub_fps(int_to_fp(PRI_MAX), div_fp_int(t->recent_cpu, 4)), 2 * t->nice));
  // 
  t->priority = t->priority < PRI_MIN ? PRI_MIN : t->priority;
  t->priority = t->priority > PRI_MAX ? PRI_MAX : t->priority;
}

the last two line is just because I am afraid the priority went beyound the scope (PRI_MIN to PRI_MAX)

so we do the clipping

the mlfqs tests so then pass, this part done

docs.title: pre-requirements
docs.text:
Task1

  • No task1 code is required, but need to fix scheduler big bugs
  • can start with fresh code or build upon existing code

docs.title: files:
docs.text:
everything should be in the userprog directory

src/userprog/process.c

  • Handles loading, execution and exit of processes, set up the stack here

src/userprog/syscall.c

  • All system calls
  • it just exits at default

src/userprog/exception.c

  • Contains exception codes
  • may not need to alter

docs.title: important files
docs.text:
src/userprog/pagedir.c

  • pagedir_get_page() is used for validating memory references

src/threads/vaddr.h

  • is_user_vaddr() is used to validate user provided pointers

src/lib/string.c

  • strtok_r() can be used to tokenise strings

docs.title: user program in Unix
docs.text:
when cp -r /usr/bin/temp is called

  • the shell parses user input
  • the shell calls for() and execve("cp", argv, env) with the stack set up
  • cp process, uses the file system and might print to the console or returning a exit code

docs.title: execution in pintos
docs.text:
when pintos run task is called

in src/threads/init.c

main() -> run_actions(argv) -> run_task(argv) -> process_wait(process_execute(argv[1]))

in src/userprog/process.c

process_wait(pid) suspends caller until process terminates

process_execute(fname) -> thread_create(fname, PRI_DEF, start_process, fcopy) -> start_process(fcopy) -> load(fcopy, &if_.eip, &if._esp)

docs.title: requirements
docs.text:
• termination messages
  • arg passing and stack setup
  • user pointers and safe memory access
  • system calls
  • filesystem interface
  • process waiting
  • denying writes to executables

docs.title: termination
docs.text:
whenever a user process terminates, print the name and exit code

but do not print when a kernel thread that is not a user process terminates, or halt system call is invoked, and dont print any other messages Pintos doesnt already print

docs.title: Parsing Arguments
docs.text:
parse a command line string into process arguments

just call strtok_r() in lib/string.c

call this anywhere you load the process, recommended in the process_execute()

docs.title: set up the stack
docs.text:
• push the arguments onto the stack in reverse order one by one
  • push a null pointer(0)
  • push pointers to the arguments(in reverse)
  • push a pointer to the first pointer
  • push the number of args
  • push a fake return address(0)

use the hex_dump() in src/lib/stdio.h

in start_process() once the interrupt frame is intitialized

so we have something like this

if for cp foo.txt ../bar.txt \(\begin{array}{|c|} \hline \text{../bar.txt}\\ \hline \text{foo.txt}\\ \hline \text{cp}\\ \hline 0\\ \hline \text{argv[0]}\\ \hline \text{argv[1]}\\ \hline \text{argv[2]}\\ \hline \text{argv}\\ \hline 0 \hline \end{array}\)

docs.title: Handleing User pointers
docs.text:
if a userprog makes a system call, dereference the pointers used to pass arguments

deal with Null pointers, pointer to unmapped user memory, pointers to kernel address

if met, just kill the process and free the resources

docs.title: Option1: Verify Before Dereferencing
docs.text:
Verify each pointer before you dereference it(simpler option)

  • check if poitner is in user space
  • check if the address is mapped

docs.title: Option2: Modify Fault Handler
docs.text:
Only check the pointer address is in the user space

invalid pointers trigger a page fault when dereferenced

task3 need to do this anyway

docs.title: System calls
docs.text:
allow users to ask the kernel to execute some operations

implement the syscall_handler() in src/userprog/syscall.c

  • Syscall arguments are passed to the handler on a interruot frame
  • read the syscall number at the stack pointer(f -> esp)
  • Next, read the argument above the stack pointer
  • Then pass these to the suitable function(syscall-nr.h)
  • return the result to f-> eax

recommended to implement with function pointers instead of ifelse and switchcases

docs.title: filesystem
docs.text:
sys/filesys

do not need to modify

should not be considered as thread-safe(task 4 in stanford original pintos)

ensure mutex over the whole filesys when modifying files

(no finer level of synchronisation is expected)

STDOUT_FILENO for writng to the console

STDIN_FILENO for reading from the console

docs.title: process waiting
docs.text:
the calling process blocks waiting for the child process, with the provided tid to exit

managing the mapping between the file descriptor is part of task 2, but recommended implementation is to use some 3rd party stuff, alot of cs means it is freed

docs.title: deny writes to executables
docs.text:
code that is currentl running should not be modified in-flight

use file_deny_write to prevent writes to an open file

use file_allow_write to re-enable writes once the file is closed

docs.title: suggested order:
docs.text:
Temporarily set up the stack to avoid immediate page faults.

Implement safe user memory access.

Set up a basic syscall handler.

Implement exit syscall and process termination messages.

Implement write to console.

Change process wait to an infinite loop. (At this point, processes will execute but will not exit- being able to run individual tests and look at their .output files will be invaluable.)

(nothing will work until here)

Start implementing everything else, beginning with argument passing and process wait(). This can be done in parallel.

docs.title: VM overview:
docs.text:
so we got a PHYS_BASE at 3GB, the total memory is 4GB

it is similar to the linux 32-bit VM in 50004 lecture 9

so we have

when we try to access a data, it checks the page table and retrieve the part from the 4MB memory

User VM is oer-process

  • when the kernel switches processes it also switches use virtual address spaces
  • stuct thread contains a pointer to a process's page table

Kernel VM is global, pintos maps every physical address to kernel address using a fixed offset(PHYS_BASE)

the user program is loaded with load_segment() (already done)

in reading and writing, the MMU maps the memory automatically

  • is_user_vaddr(): just if hte provided user virtual address is below PHYS_BASE
  • pagedir_get_page(): looks up the physical address for the provided user virtual address, return null is unmapped

alloc user memory

  • palloc_get_page obtains a single free page of memmory and returns its kernel address
  • Useful flags: PAL_USER (user pool page), PAL_ZERO (fill page with zeros)
  • install page() adds a mapping from the user virtual address to the kernel address
  • writable flag controls if the user can modify the page or not

free user memory

  • pagedir_clear_page() marks the user virtual page as not present in the process's page directory
  • palloc_free_page deallocates the memory

page faults:

  • try to access kernel VM
  • try to access unmapped user VM

for the process_wait, the recommended solutions is to create some third party stuff (intermediate SQL tables for relations) to check parent and child, since we have no idea what the child process may do

docs.title: subtask 6
docs.text:
Implement the write() syscall for STDOUT so that you can see printfs from the user programs.

when the file sys is not complete, we only need to take care of fd 0 case, the spec says it a putbuf call

so we do

C
int write (int fd, const void *buffer, unsigned size)
{
  lock_acquire(&IO_lock);
  int rtrn; // for the final return
  if (fd == 1) {
    // write to console
    putbuf(buffer, size);
    rtrn = size;
  }
  // else {
    // this still needs to be implemented 
    // when the filesys is done
    // subtasks 5 is done
  // }
  lock_release(&IO_lock);
  return -1;
}

docs.title: 2.4 css特性
docs.text:
• 继承性: 子级默认继承父级的字体特性
  • 一般把文字写到body标签,然后特定元素单独设置
  • 层叠性
  • 相同的属性会覆盖,后面的css覆盖前面的css属性
  • 不同是属性会叠加,不同的css属性都生效
  • 优先级:但一个标签用了多种选择器的时候
  • 选择器优先级高的样式神效
  • 通配符选择器(*)< 标签选择器(p,div...) < 类选择器(.class) < id选择器(#id) < 行内样式 < !important (除了!important以外,选中标签的范围越大,优先级越低)
  • 如果涉及复合选择器,则需要叠加计算
    • 按照行内样式,id选择器个数,类选择器个数,标签选择器个数,(从左到右比较)

docs.title: 2.5 字体属性:
docs.text:
Info

说明

这部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/font.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

docs.title: 2.5.1 color:
docs.text:
• color
    • 各种颜色: 查表https://www.w3schools.com/colors/colors_names.asp
    • 色值:(茴香豆有4种写法,色值主要有3种写法)
    • RGB值:rgb(255,99,71),三个值分别对应rgb三个值,取值范围0-255
      • < p style="background-color:rgb(255, 99, 71)">html< /p>:

        rgb(255,99,71)

    • HEX值:#ff6347,和上面差不多,每两位表示RGB中的一个值,前面加上井号
      • < p style="background-color:#ff6347">html< /p>:

        #ff6347

    • RGBA值:rgba(255,99,71,1),rgba加上透明度(这个应该是可以的,但是jupyter不知道为什么会把style吞掉,如果%%html没问题,直接markdown不显示颜色)
      • < p style="background-color:rgba(255, 99, 71, 0.5)">< /p>:

        rgba(9, 100%, 64%, 0.5)

代码

CSS
div{color:red;}
div{color:#ff0000;}
div{color:rgb(255,0,0)}
div{color:rgba(255.0,0,.5)}

docs.title: 2.5.2 font-size
docs.text:
某些浏览器有最小字体大小

代码

CSS
div{font-size:10px;}

docs.title: 2.5.3 font-weight:
docs.text:
设置文本的粗细

  • bold:加粗
  • bolder:更粗
  • lighter:更细
  • 100-900:默认400,bold700

注: 其实如果自己引入字体的话,可以自定义,@font-face

Example

代码 HTML
#5 {font-weight:normal}
#6 {font-weight:bold}
#7 {font-weight:bolder}
#8 {font-weight:lighter}
#9 {font-weight:360}

docs.title: 2.5.4 font-style:
docs.text:
设置文本的字体样式

  • normal:默认
  • italic:斜体字

Example

代码 HTML
#10 {font-style:normal}
#11 {font-style:italic}

docs.title: 2.5.5 font-family:
docs.text: 用来指定一个元素的字体,如果字体名称包含空格,则必须用引号包裹

docs.title: 2.5.6 line-height:
docs.text:
设置文本间距,单倍间距或者双倍间距等

  • 数字px
  • 数据(几倍行距)

docs.title: 2.5.7 font:
docs.text:
把上面所有font属性写到一起

字号和字体值必须写,不然不生效

Info

说明

text部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/text.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

docs.title: 2.5.8 text-indent:
docs.text:
文本缩进

  • 数字px
  • 数字em(1em是当前标签的字号大小)

docs.title: 2.5.9 text-align:
docs.text: 内容对齐,默认是left,居中的是文字,不是标签

docs.title: 2.5.10 text-decoration:
docs.text:
加上修饰线

  • none;
  • underline
  • line-through
  • overline

代码

Python
div {
    # font-style, font-weight font-size line-height font-family
    font: italic 700 30px/2 楷体;
}

docs.title: 2.6 背景
docs.text:
Info

说明

这部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/background.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

docs.title: 2.6.1 background-color
docs.text: 和color一样,但是color是文字的颜色,bgc是背景的颜色

docs.title: 2.6.2 background-image
docs.text:
那个url()里面可以填本地地址,直接从本地访问图片,也可以直接url,

代码

HTML
.box{
    width: 600px;
    height: 600px;
    background-image: url("some url")
}

docs.title: 2.6.3 background-repeat:
docs.text:
设置图片如何重复:

  • repeat:默认属性,在分配的空间大于图片大小的时候会像两个方向重复图片
  • repeat-x:只在x方向上重复图片
  • repeat-y:只在y方向上重复图片
  • no-repeat:不重复图片

代码

HTML
.box{
    background-image:url("something");
    background-repeat:no-repeat;
}

docs.title: 2.6.4 background-size:
docs.text:
设置背景图片的大小

  • length:设置背景图片的宽度和高度,可以只设置一个值,另一个会默认成auto
  • percentage:设置图片占相对区域面积的百分比,可以只设置一个值,另一个会默认成auto
  • cover:将图片设置成能完全覆盖背景区域的最大大小
  • contain:保持图片和总比并且放缩成适合背景定位的最大大小

代码

HTML
.box{
    background-image: url("something");
    background-size 100% 100%;
}

docs.title: 2.6.5 background-position:
docs.text:
以下都是第一个位置为水平位置,第二个为垂直位置,英文字面意思,不要多想

  • left top
  • left center
  • left bottom
  • right center
  • right bottom
  • center top
  • center center
  • center bottom
  • x% y%
  • xpos ypos

代码

HTML
.box{
    background-image: url("something");
    background-position: left top;
}

docs.title: 2.6.6 background-attachment
docs.text: 使背景不会跟着元素移动

docs.title: 2.6.7 background复合:
docs.text: 把上面所有属性写到一起,空格隔开,不区分顺序

docs.title: 2.7文本属性
docs.text:
感觉好像font里也写了一遍,不过不管了

Info

说明

text部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/text.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

docs.title: 2.7.1 text-align
docs.text:
文本对齐方式,英文字面意思

  • left
  • right
  • center

代码

HTML
h1 {
    text-align:center
}

docs.title: 2.7.2 text-decoration:
docs.text:
添加到文本的修饰,下划线,上划线,删除线等,英文字面意思

  • underline
  • overline
  • line-through

代码

HTML
h1 {
    text-decoration:underline;
}

docs.title: 2.7.3 text-transform
docs.text:
还是英文字面意思

  • captialize
  • uppercase
  • lowercase

代码

Python
h1 {
    text-transform:uppercase;
}

docs.title: 2.7.4 text-indent:
docs.text:
定义缩进,直接是x px

代码

Python
h1 {
    text-indent:30px;
}

docs.title: 2.8 表格/边界属性
docs.text:
Info

说明

text部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/table.html,并确保阅读首页须知,本来想分开的,但是没了边界属性之外感觉表格就没东西了

docs.title: 2.8.1 border：
docs.text:
定义表格边框：

  • 边框距离
  • 边框样式
  • 边框颜色

代码

HTML
table,td{
    border: 1px solid black;
}

docs.title: 2.8.2 border-collapse:
docs.text:
设置边框是折叠成一个单一的边框还是隔开

代码

Python
table{
    border-collapse:collapse;
}

docs.title: 2.8.3 border-radius(这个一般不在表格中用)
docs.text:
创建圆角

  • 设置一个值:四个角圆角相同
  • 设置两个值:第一个为左上角和右下角,第二个值为右上角和左下角
  • 设置三个值:第一个为左上角,第二个为右上角和左下角,第三个是右下角
  • 设置四个值:第一个为左上角,第二个为右上角,第三个为左下角,第四个是右下角
Python
#border-radius1{
            width:200px;
            height:200px;
            background:violet;
            border-radius:20px;
        }

docs.title: 2.9 css盒子模型:
docs.text:
Info

说明

盒子部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/box_model.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

封装周围的html元素的整体框架

  • margin 外边距,透明的
  • border 边框
  • padding 内边距,透明的
  • content 实际内容,编辑weight和height的时候实际编辑的是content部分的大小

针对这几个有一堆的css属性,具体自己查https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/index.php

一般border属性都以border开头

常用的对于以上四个都适用的,英文字面意思

  • margin-top
  • margin-bottom
  • margin-left
  • margin-right
  • border-top
  • border-bottom
  • border-left
  • border-right
  • padding-top
  • padding-bottom
  • padding-left
  • padding-right

盒子大小

  • 默认:盒子大小= 内容尺寸 + border尺寸 + 内边距尺寸

margin不算进盒子

  • border和padding会撑大盒子
  • 解决:
  • 手动做减法
  • 内减模式: box-sizing:border-box

docs.title: 2.9.1 外边距问题:
docs.text:
子级添加margin会导致父元素塌陷

解决办法:

  • 取消自己margin,父级设置padding
  • 父级设置overflow:hidden
  • 父级设置border-top

docs.title: 2.9.2 行内元素内外边距问题:
docs.text:
行内元素添加margin和padding无法改变垂直位置

解决问题: 加line-height

docs.title: 2.9.3 清除默认样式:
docs.text:
比如p标签的空白,这里用全局选择器

代码

Text Only
* {
    margin: 0px;
    padding: 0px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

docs.title: 2.9.4 元素溢出:
docs.text:
用overflow控制,或者overflow-x,overflow-y

  • scroll : 无论是否溢出都有滚动条
  • hidden: 隐藏溢出部分
  • auto: 自动识别,溢出就加scroll

docs.title: 2.9.5 box-shadow
docs.text:
一共四个值:

  • h-shadow(必选):水平阴影的位置
  • v-shadow(必选):垂直阴影的位置
  • blur(可选):模糊距离
  • color(可选):阴影的颜色

代码

HTML
#box-shadow1{
            width:200px;
            height:200px;
            background:aqua;
            box-shadow: 10px 20px
        }

docs.title: 2.10 css弹性盒子
docs.text:
Info

说明

弹性盒子部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/flex-box.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

弹性元素由弹性容器和弹性子元素组成,通过设置display的属性将其定义为弹性容器

弹性盒子默认横向摆放

  • display:flex 启用弹性盒子,默认为水平排列

这种子元素可以自动基岩或拉伸

组成部分: - 弹性容器 - 弹性盒子 - 主轴: 默认在水平方向 - 侧轴: 默认在垂直方向

docs.title: 2.10.1 justify-content:
docs.text:
• flex-start: 默认值,从七点开始依次排列
  • flex-end: 弹性盒子从终点开始依次排列
  • center: 主轴居中
  • space-between: 均匀排列,空白在盒子中间
  • space-around: 均匀排列,空白在盒子两侧
  • space-evenly: 弹性盒子和容器之间间距相等

docs.title: 2.10.2 flex-direction:
docs.text:
• row 横向从左到右摆放
  • row-reverse 横向从右到左摆放
  • column 纵向从上到下排列
  • column-reverse 纵向从下到上排列

docs.title: 2.10.3 align-items:
docs.text:
• flex-start
  • flex-end
  • center

docs.title: 2.10.4 align-self:
docs.text: 单独控制某个弹性盒子的侧轴排列方式 - stretch: 沿着测轴拉伸至铺满容器 - center: 居中 - flex-start: 起点开始排列 - flex-end: 弹性盒子从终点开始依次排列

docs.title: 2.10.5 flex:
docs.text:
控制弹性盒子在主轴方向的尺寸

属性值: 政治素质,表示占用父级元素剩余尺寸的分数,默认是1

docs.title: 2.10.6 flex-grow:
docs.text:
设置扩展因子,会根据弹性盒子的扩展因子分配剩余空间

可以设置扩展因子让各个元素大小自动按比例分配

各个元素的比例=扩展因子+1

docs.title: 2.10.7 flex-wrap:
docs.text:
弹性盒子可以自动挤压或者拉伸,默认情况下,所有天哪星河在一行显示

  • wrap: 换行
  • no-wrap: 不换行(默认)

docs.title: 2.10.8 align-content
docs.text:
这个是不会对单行生效的,和align-itmes似乎是一个东西

  • flex-start: 默认值,从七点开始依次排列
  • flex-end: 弹性盒子从终点开始依次排列
  • center: 主轴居中
  • space-between: 均匀排列,空白在盒子中间
  • space-around: 均匀排列,空白在盒子两侧
  • space-evenly: 弹性盒子和容器之间间距相等

docs.title: 2.11.2.1 空格折叠
docs.text: 无论放多少个空格都会被折叠成一个空格

docs.title: 2.11.2.2 元素无间隙:
docs.text: 如果有两个并排的图片一起放置,中间是没有间隙的

docs.title: 2.11.2 解决:
docs.text:
脱离文档流:

  • 浮动
  • 绝对定位
  • 固定定位

docs.title: 浮动:
docs.text:
Info

说明

浮动部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/float.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

Info

说明

清除浮动部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/disable-float.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

float属性:(只有左右浮动,没有上下浮动),可以是元素拖了文档流

  • left(向左浮动)
  • right(向右浮动)

元素同时向一方向浮动的时候,会变成水平摆放,向左或者向右

当容器大小不足的时候会在下一行摆放

docs.title: 2.11.2.1 清除浮动:
docs.text:
清除浮动会导致某些元素的位置发生变化,后续元素会收到影响

比如如果父级元素没有高度,子级元素无法撑开父级高度

  • 父元素设置相应属性
  • 增加clear属性, clear:both
  • overflow清除浮动
  • 伪对象方式, 在父级对象加上一个::after或者::before选择器,设置clear:both

docs.title: 2.11.2.1.1 clear
docs.text:
• left(清除左浮动)
  • right(清除右浮动)
  • both(清除左右浮动,如果有的话)

docs.title: 2.11.2.1.2 overflow:
docs.text:
如果父元素出了问题,同级元素受到影响,可以用overflow清除浮动,这种情况下不能设置父元素的高度

  • visible(全部铺在页面上)
  • hidden(隐藏)
  • clip(把多的部分隐藏)
  • scroll(增加一个可滚动的轴,大小不调整)
  • auto(自适应)

docs.title: 2.12 定位:
docs.text:
Info

说明

position部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/position.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

position属性

  • relative
  • absolute(脱离文档流)
  • fixed(脱离文档流)

可以使用left,top,right,bottom四个属性调整位置

对于absolute可以理解成每一个absolute的元素都在一个新的图层上(子绝父相)

fixed一般来说不会有这个问题,因为fixed元素会跟着页面滚动

设置定位后定位随着能定位的父元素决定,直到顶层文档

定位方式 属性值 是否脱离标准流(文档流) 显示模式 参照物 相对定位 relative 否 保持标签原有显示模式 自己原来的位置 绝对定位 absolute 是 行内块特点 已经定位的祖先元素或者浏览器可视区 固定定位 fixed 是 行内块特点 浏览器窗口

docs.title: 2.12.1 z-index:
docs.text: 解决图层问题,后来者居上,取值越大越靠上

docs.title: 2.13 transition:
docs.text:
和@keyframes 差不多, 语法上也差不多

  • 可以在一个元素不同状态之间切换的时候添加过渡效果
  • transition: 过渡属性,花费时间
  • 注意:
  • 过渡属性可以是具体的css属性
  • 也可以设置为all,所有不同的属性值都产生过渡效果
  • transition设置给元素本身
  • 一般和伪对象选择器一起使用,设置不同状态

docs.title: 2.14 opacity:
docs.text: 设置整的元素的透明度,0-1

docs.title: 2.15 SEO:
docs.text:
尽量让网页在搜索引擎里靠前,一般企业里会用

方法:

  • 氪金
  • 网页后缀设置为html
  • 标签语义化(在合适的地方使用合适的标签)

网页SEO标签

  • title: 网页标题标签 < head>里的< title>
  • description:网页描述 < head>里的< meta name="description">
  • keywords: 网页关键词 < head>里的< meta name="keywords">

docs.title: 2.16 Favicon图标:
docs.text:
出现在浏览器标题栏的图标

代码

HTML
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="文件名" type="image/x-icon">

docs.title: 2.17 各种效果:
docs.text:
Info

说明

tranlates部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/translates.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

docs.title: 2.17.1.1 平移:
docs.text: transition和translate实现

docs.title: 2.17.1.2 旋转效果:
docs.text:
代码

CSS
transform: rotate(角度)

https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/transform-function/rotate

docs.title: 2.17.1.3 转换原点:
docs.text:
代码

CSS
transform-origin: 水平位置 垂直位置

docs.title: 2.17.1.4 复合效果:
docs.text:
代码

CSS
transform: translate() rotate()

transform属性有层叠性,不能一个一个写,必须写进一个transform属性里

docs.title: 2.17.1.5 缩放:
docs.text:
代码

CSS
transform: scale(缩放倍数)

或者

代码

CSS
transform: scale(X缩放倍数,Y缩放倍数)

docs.title: 2.17.1.6 倾斜:
docs.text: transform: skew(角度);

docs.title: 2.17.1.7.1 线性:
docs.text:
代码

CSS
background-image linear-gradient(
    渐变方向(角度或者to),
    颜色1, 终点位置(可不写)
    颜色2, 终点位置(可不写)
)

https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/gradient/linear-gradient

docs.title: 2.17.1.7.2 径向
docs.text:
代码

CSS
background-image radial-gradient(
    半径 at 圆形位置(x位置 y位置),
    颜色1, 终点位置(可不写)
    颜色2, 终点位置(可不写)
)

半径可以是两条,这种情况会变成椭圆

docs.title: 2.17.2.1 平移:
docs.text:
代码

CSS
transform: translate3d(x,y,z); /*这里必须逗号隔开*/
transform: translateX();
transform: translateY();
transform: translateZ();

默认z是没有效果的,但是可以给父级元素设置视距

docs.title: 2.17.2.2 视距
docs.text:
perspective: 视距

添加给直接父级元素

docs.title: 2.17.2.3 旋转
docs.text:
代码

CSS
transform: rotateX(值);
transform: rotateY(值);
transform: rotateZ(值);

或者

代码

CSS
transform: rotate3d(x,y,z,角度); /*x,y,z是0-1之间的数字*/

docs.title: 2.17.2.4 立体呈现:
docs.text:
代码

CSS
transform-style: 属性
  • flat: 子级处于平面中
  • preserve-3d: 自己处于3D空间

docs.title: 2.17.2.5 空间缩放:
docs.text:
代码

CSS
transform: scale3d(x,y,z);

docs.title: 2.18 动画:
docs.text:
用@keyframes创建动画,这个会一直重复播放

属性太多了,建议自己查表https://www.w3schools.com/css/css3_animations.asp

同时要在对应的元素上加animation属性

代码

CSS
animation: 动画名称 动画时长 速度曲线 延迟时间 重复次数 动画方向 执行完毕时状态

比如

代码

CSS
#breath:hover{
    animation: breath 2700ms ease-in-out 0s infinite alternate running;
}

或者拆成多个属性值去写 - animation-name - animation-duration - animation-delay - animation-fill-mode - forwards: 最后一帧状态 - backwards: 第一帧状态 - animation-timing-function - linear - ease-in-out - step() - ... - animation-iteration-count - infinite - 数字 - animation-direction - alternate为反向 - animation-play-state - paused为暂停

代码

CSS
@keyframes rainbow{
                0%{
                    height:25px;
                    width:25px;
                    background-color:red;
                }
                16%{
                    height:50px;
                    width:50px;
                    background-color:orange;
                }
                33%{
                    height:75px;
                    width:75px;
                    background-color:yellow
                }
                50%{
                    height:100px;
                    width:100px;
                    background-color:green
                }
                67%{
                    height:125px;
                    width:125px;
                    background-color:aquamarine;
                }
                83%{
                    height:150px;
                    width:150px;
                    background-color:blue
                }
                100%{
                    height:175px;
                    width:175px;
                    background-color:purple;
                }
            }

docs.title: 2.19.3 适配方案:
docs.text:
• 宽度适配:宽度自适应,pc端网页
  • 百分比布局
  • flex布局
  • 注意:这两个不能高度自适应
  • 等比适配:宽高等比缩放,移动端网页
  • rem
  • vw

docs.title: 2.19.4 rem:
docs.text: rem是个相对单位,表示1HTML字号大小,是相对HTML标签字号计算出的单位

docs.title: 2.19.5 vw vh
docs.text: 也是相对单位,相对试图的尺寸的计算结果,50vw表示50%视图宽

说明

检测视口的宽度,编写差异化的css, 如果用rem调整大小,只需要固定html字号即可

先设置< meta>

用@media创建媒体查询,在不同屏幕大小下设置不同比例

HTML

                    background-color:aqua;
                }
                #p{
                    display:none;
                }
            }

docs.title: 2.20 less
docs.text:
css的扩展,使css具备一定的逻辑性计算能力

存放在 .less文件中,网页要引入对应的css,因为浏览器不支持less

VScode的插件Easy less,应该也有别的插件能做到,不过先用这个

多行注释和css一样

docs.title: 2.20.2 支持运算:
docs.text:
加减乘除直接写计算表达式

除法要么用括号括起来,要么用 ./

如果运算中出现多个单位值,最后只会以一个单位为准

}

同时可以写&:hover实现伪对象选择器

  • width: the width of the img

    <input type="text">
    <input type="checkbox">
    <input type="number">
    <input type="password">
    male<input type="radio" name="gender">

</html>

docs.title: Why do you wan to work at Blackrock?
docs.text:
I am always interested in finance, investigating how money itself makes more money and I am fascinated by how companies like blackrock allocate resourses in such a huge amount to achieve success. As far as I am concerned, blackrock holds a considerable amount of share from big companies around the world, from being the thrid largest shareholder of alibaba, one of the largest IT companies in China, to holding more than 5% of share in Microsoft, Nvidia, Apple and so on. An experience in blackrock would allow me to apply my analytical skills and knowledge to real-world situations and gain a deeper understanding of finance

Futhermore, Blackrock has a culture of innovation, curiousity, and diversity, which enables everyone in the community to make an impact in not only the financial market, but also the entire world. By investing in the big companies over the world, Blackrock has backuped the world-changing idea with even more solid finance background, the enables many great ideas to take place around the globe. I am eager to contribute to the team, to help making blackrock and the whole world a better place.

Last but not least, I believe my software engineering skills along with some financial knowledge can qualify myself a place in blackrock. I am confident that my participation in blackrock can be mutually beneficial

docs.title: Why do you choose this division
docs.text:
I'm drawn to the software engineering division at BlackRock for several reasons. Firstly, BlackRock is a global leader in financial technology and investment management, and their innovative use of technology has always been impressive to me. I am particularly interested in working with a team that builds cutting-edge software solutions to manage and analyze massive amounts of financial data, which directly impacts the world economy.

Secondly, I admire BlackRock's commitment to using technology for responsible investing and risk management, which aligns with my personal values and professional goals. I am always thrilled by how softwares help shape the financial market. The AI hype is washing over the market, bring new challenges but also new opportunities. Powerful technology could be use in quantitative financial measures to allow more fine-grained and more rapid response to the dynamic financial environment and believe that by contributing to the software engineering division, I can play a crucial role in shaping the future of finance through efficient algorithms and platforms.

Lastly, I am excited about the opportunities for growth and continuous learning within the company. With its strong emphasis on innovation and R&D, BlackRock provides an environment where I can collaborate with talented engineers, work with the latest technologies, and contribute to projects that make a real difference in the industry.

docs.title: What is something not on your CV
docs.text:
One particular thing that is not on my CV is that I am actively taking courses about finance, which including the quantitative trading course and the SEC courses in the algorithmic trading club and the investment clubs at Imperial College. Although I may not be that skilled as I am in software engineering, but I still eager to learn more about finance, to understand how and what today's financial market is build upon.

I am also an active learner, even not mentioned on my CV, I have learnt how to build websites, operating database, and also learn the basics of data analysis on my own. Using the python libraries to plot visualise financial data, do a simple regression to model a best fit line or even try to predict furture stock price with simple model structures. I could also manipulate databases, storing large amounts of data that would be otherwise too big to store and retrieve quickly in SQL enviornments. I could also utilise the data further to build my own website(both front end and back end).

These active engagement in innovation and gaining knowledge, as I always believed, are some crucial skills that a successful person should always have. If I am admitted into this position, I would also treasure this opportunity to observe how the elites at blackrock work, what technology do they use and how they solve financial issues with the use of software enginnering skills. I believe my participation in blackrock spring insight event would be mutually beneficial

docs.title: What is your greatest failure?
docs.text:
my greatest failure happened when I was little in primary school. Our English teacher separated the whole class into threee groups and ask each group to perform a short scene from peppa pig. I was assigned the leader of a group because I was well known for English-fluency at that time. I was convince, at first, that I should participate as the main role to get a much attention as I should have deserved. So when another classmate of mine came over and said, Hey! can I be the main character. I was furious. As a young kid aged below 10, I did not know what collaboration is and I did not know how to let everyone be satisfied. So we quarreuled for a long time until someone finally put us apart.

The rehersal was not going smoothly, as the persistence with the main role arouse much controversy among the team. Even if I make it I would not recieve the attention I wanted to because the person I argued with and some of his friend were not coorperating. We could even make one full rehersal. So at that time, after a long time convincing myself, I gave up to role, take the most unwanted narrator, he was happy, everyone is happy, and the show went on smoothly.

It was then that I realized the importance of collboration. Thoughout the numerous team projects I lead. If some team players are not happy, then I would just find him and try to come up with a solution within the group's acceptable range. If others are focused to be absent due to serious health conditions, I would split the work into smaller pieces and try to evenly assign it on every of us. I could say that after that incident, I have gradually became a team player and also a team leader that could make me qualified in the diverse and collaborative environment of blackrock

What experience do you hop to gain at bllackrock

Firstly, BlackRock is a global leader in financial technology and investment management, and their innovative use of technology has always been impressive to me. I am particularly interested in working with a team that builds cutting-edge software solutions to manage and analyze massive amounts of financial data, which directly impacts the world economy. and this is one part of the experiences I am looking forward to

Secondly Blackrock has a culture of innovation, curiousity, and diversity, which enables everyone in the community to make an impact in not only the financial market, but also the entire world. By investing in the big companies over the world, Blackrock has backuped the world-changing idea with even more solid finance background, the enables many great ideas to take place around the globe.

With its strong emphasis on innovation and R&D, BlackRock provides an environment where I can collaborate with talented engineers, work with the latest technologies, and contribute to projects that make a real difference in the industry. I am eager to contribute to the team, to help making blackrock and the whole world a better place.

Tell me about something you are passionate about or inspried by

I am always interested in finance, investigating how money itself makes more money and I am fascinated by how companies like blackrock allocate resourses in such a huge amount to achieve success. As far as I am concerned, blackrock holds a considerable amount of share from big companies around the world, from being the thrid largest shareholder of alibaba, one of the largest IT companies in China, to holding more than 5% of share in Microsoft, Nvidia, Apple and so on.

I am actively taking courses about finance, which including the quantitative trading course and the SEC courses in the algorithmic trading club and the investment clubs at Imperial College. Although I may not be that skilled as I am in software engineering, but I still eager to learn more about finance, to understand how and what today's financial market is build upon.

I am also passionate about data anlysis something finance could not live without. I have learnt how to operate database, and also learn the basics of data analysis on my own. Using the python libraries to plot visualise financial data, do a simple regression to model a best fit line or even try to predict furture stock price with simple model structures.

docs.title: vim缓存
docs.text:
当开发人员在线上环境中使用 vim 编辑器，在使用过程中会留下 vim 编辑器缓存，当vim异常退出时，缓存会一直留在服务器上，引起网站源码泄露。

后缀是区分这些交换文件的方法同一个文件产生的多个交换文件的后缀是不一样的

以 index.php 为例：第一次产生的交换文件名为 .index.php.swp

再次意外退出后，将会产生名为 .index.php.swo 的交换文件

第三次产生的交换文件则为 .index.php.swn

所以在url后面加上.index.php.swp即可

docs.title: DS_Store

docs.title: sql注入
docs.text: 这类问题说白了就是没有设置好sql的空里写什么

docs.title: 整数型注入
docs.text:
如果在不知道题目的情况下可以先输入1试试

显示sql语句

SQL
select * from news where id = 1
-- ID: 1
-- Data: ctfhub
SQL
select * from news where id = 2
-- ID: 2
-- Data: skill

于是知道这道题是整数型注入

查询字段数

SQL
select * from news where id = 1 or 1 = 1 order by 2

其中

SQL
order by 1
order by 2
order by 3
...

表示按照第几个字段排序,所以可以用来检查字段数

order by 3 的时候不回显,所以有两个字段

然后用union select联合查询回显位置

SQL
select * from news where id = 1 union select 1,2

select 1,2 正常来说只会返回第一列是1,第二列是2,列数和数据库列数相同的表

返回

SQL
select * from news where id= 1 union select 1,2
-- ID: 1
-- Data: ctfhub

很明显,这个是因为ctfhub的id=1,所以改成不可能出现在数据库里的id,比如-1,来阻止表内数字出现

请求报文的组成部分有: - 请求行:请求方法, URL, 协议 - 请求头:以键值对的格式携带的附加信息,比如Content-type - 空行:空行 - 请求体: 发送的资源

docs.title: 7.4 Promise:
docs.text:
Promise对象用于表示一个异步操作的最终完成或失败机器结果值

Example

代码示例 JavaScript
const p = new Promise((resolve, reject)=>{
    // 执行异步任务
})

p.then(result => {
    // 成功后的代码
}).catch(error => {
    // 失败后的代码
})

请自行查看examples/ajax/Promise.html

好处: - 逻辑更清晰 - 解决回调函数地狱问题

resolve表示成功,reject表示throw an error

Example

代码示例 JavaScript
const p = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
        // resolve("succeed")
        reject(new Error("就是不让你过"))
    }, 2000)
})

p.then(result => {
    console.log(result)
}).catch(error => {
    console.log(error)
})

请自行查看examples/ajax/error.html

docs.title: 7.4.1 三种状态:
docs.text:
创建对象的时候会处于pending状态

resolve执行后变成fullfilled状态,直接进入then回调函数

reject执行后状态变成rejected,直接进入catch回调函数

Promise对象一旦被兑现/拒绝就是好已经敲定了,状态无法再被改变

docs.title: 7.5 同步异步:
docs.text:
同步代码:需要等上一个执行完在执行下一个

异步代码:可以同时执行

异步: - 回调函数 - setInterval - ...

docs.title: 7.5.1 回调函数地狱:
docs.text: 回调函数来回嵌套,虽然是syntactic sugar

docs.title: 7.5.1.1 Promise链式调用:
docs.text:
new Promise执行then的时候可以新创建一个Promise对象,然后可以接着调用then的函数

在避免了来回形式调用的同时保证逻辑嵌套

Info

示例

请自行查看examples/ajax/primiseChain.html

JavaScript
new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    setTimeout(() => {
        reject("1")
    }, 1000)
}).then(result =>{
    console.log(result)
    return Promise.reject("2")
}).catch(error =>{
    console.log(error)
    return Promise.reject("3")
}).then(result => {
    console.log(result)
    return Promise.reject("4")
}).catch(error =>{
    console.log(error)
    return Promise.reject("5")
}).then(result => {
    console.log(result)
}).catch(error =>{
    console.log(error)
})

docs.title: 7.5.2 async await
docs.text:
async作为函数的修饰关键字

await在async函数内部取代then函数,等待Promise对象成功状态的结果值

Info

示例

请自行查看examples/ajax/asyncAwait.html

docs.title: 7.5.3 事件循环:
docs.text: 之前有,就不写了

docs.title: 7.5.4 宏任务和微任务:
docs.text:
• 宏任务: 浏览器执行的异步代码
  • 微任务: JS引擎执行的异步代码
任务(代码) 执行所在环境 JS脚本执行(script) 浏览器 setTimeout/setInterval 浏览器 AJAX 浏览器 用户交互 浏览器 任务(代码) 执行所在环境 Promise对象.then() JS引擎

Promise语句本身是同步代码,所以会先执行Promise里面的代码然后等

会优先执行微任务队列里的任务,然后执行宏任务队列

Example

代码 HTML
<script>
console.log(1) // 同步代码,立即执行
setTimeout(()=>{ // 异步代码,进入队列
    console.log(2) // 同步代码执行完之后,虽然延时是0,但是进入宏任务队列
},0)
const p = new Promise((resolve, reject) => { // Promise里是同步代码,这部分立即执行
    console.log(3)
    resolve(4) // 标记状态,但不直接执行then
})
p.then(result => { // 这个进入微任务队列,比宏任务队列里的任务优先执行,会先清空微任务队列,然后执行宏任务队列中的任务
    console.log(result)
})
console.log(5) // 同步代码,立即执行
</script>
输出

最后输出1 3 5 4 2

docs.title: 7.5.5 Promise.all
docs.text:
合并多个Promise对象,这个Promise的then是所有Promise成功,如果一个失败就进catch

Info

示例

请自行查看examples/ajax/PromiseAll.html

JavaScript
const p = Promise.all([Promise1, Promise2, Promise3.......])
p.then(result => {

}).catch(error => {

})

Example

代码效果 HTML
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>网页</title>
        <style>
            h1 {
                color: blue;
                font-size: 12px;
                font-family: SimSun;
                background-color: red;
            }
        </style>
    </head>
    <body>
        某个网页
        <h1 align = "center">标题1</h1>
        <h2 align = "left">标题2</h2>
        <h3 align = "right">标题3</h3>
        <h4>标题4</h4>
        <h5>标题5</h5>
        <h6>标题6</h6>
    </body>
</html>

请自行查看examples/css_involved/html/style_tag_css.html,并确保阅读首页须知

docs.title: 2.2.3 < link>
docs.text:
通过< link>引入外部css文件

同样,跳转到其他页面不会生效

注意,虽然是外部文件,但是这里加载依然会改变整个jupyter notebook的css,不建议直接在jupyter里运行

Example

代码效果 HTML
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="./examples/css_involved/css/example.css">
        <title>网页</title>
    </head>
    <body>
        <p>某个网页</p>
        <h1 align = "center">标题1</h1>
        <h2 align = "left">标题2</h2>
        <h3 align = "right">标题3</h3>
        <h4>标题4</h4>
        <h5>标题5</h5>
        <h6>标题6</h6>
    </body>
</html>

请自行查看examples/css_involved/html/link.html,并确保阅读首页须知

docs.title: 2.3 css选择器
docs.text:
Info

说明

这部分所有代码效果可请自行查看examples/css_involved/html/selectors.html,并确保阅读首页须知

docs.title: 2.3.1 全局选择器:
docs.text:
应用到所有元素上,优先级最低,一般是样式初始化

代码

CSS
    *{
        font-family: SimSun;
    }

docs.title: 2.3.2 元素选择器:
docs.text:
标签名 {属性:值;}

可以是任何html文档中的标签,但是只能同时改变所有这种标签的样式

之前已经有很多这种例子了

代码

CSS
p{
    font-size:14px;
    color:red;
}

docs.title: 2.3.3 类选择器:
docs.text:
需要现在要改样式的标签里定义class属性,然后根据class名写css

  • 可以对多种标签使用
  • 类名不能以数字开头
  • 同一个标签可以用多个类选择器,加上空格隔开的多个class属性就行,如果属性冲突,会优先使用第一个可适用的属性定义

代码

CSS
# 假设我们有一个class叫example
.example{
    color:purple;
}
# 会应用到如下tag上,注:something这个标签不存在,可以是任意标签
<something class="example">...</something>
<something class="example" class="example1">...</something>

docs.title: 2.3.4 id选择器
docs.text:
针对一个特定的标签使用,只能使用一次,css中用#定义

  • id是唯一的(规范上不能重复,语法上可行)
  • id不能以数字开头

代码

Python
#something{
    border:3px dashed green;
}

docs.title: 2.3.5 合并选择器
docs.text:
提取相同的样式,减少重复代码

选择器1,选择器2{}

代码

Python
.h1.p{
    color:green;
}

docs.title: 2.3.7 后代选择器
docs.text:
选择所有被符合选择器1的标签包含的选择器2类标签

代码

Python
ul li{
    color:green
}

docs.title: 2.3.8 >选择器：
docs.text:
只选择直接作为选择器1的标签的选择器2类标签应用css,不对更深的标签起作用

可以和上面的选择器一起用

代码

Python
ul>li{
    color:green;
}

docs.title: 2.3.9 +选择器:
docs.text:
选择跟在符合选择器1条件的标签之后的选择器2类标签应用css

可以和上面的选择器一起用

代码

Python
.example+p{
    color:red;
}

docs.title: 2.3.10 ~选择器:
docs.text:
选择跟在符合选择器1条件的标签之后的所有选择器2元素,和后代选择器不同的是这个不在选择器1标签里

代码

Python
.example~p{
    color:red;
}

docs.title: 2.3.11 伪对象选择器:
docs.text:
给元素追加一个虚拟标签,可以节省html的资源开销

  • ::after在后面添加一个对象,虚拟对象,装饰作用
  • ::before在前面添加一个对象,虚拟对象,装饰作用
  • :nth-chlid(n),选择的n个子元素
  • :first-chlid,选择第一个子元素
  • :last-child,选择最后一个子元素
  • content(必须有,否则伪对象无效)

其他查表:https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css_selectors.php

docs.title: 2.3.12 优先级
docs.text: 行内样式>ID选择器>类选择器>元素选择器

docs.title: 2.4 css特性
docs.text:
• 继承性: 子级默认继承父级的字体特性
  • 一般把文字写到body标签,然后特定元素单独设置
  • 层叠性
  • 相同的属性会覆盖,后面的css覆盖前面的css属性
  • 不同是属性会叠加,不同的css属性都生效
  • 优先级:但一个标签用了多种选择器的时候
  • 选择器优先级高的样式神效
  • 通配符选择器(*)< 标签选择器(p,div...) < 类选择器(.class) < id选择器(#id) < 行内样式 < !important (除了!important以外,选中标签的范围越大,优先级越低)
  • 如果涉及复合选择器,则需要叠加计算
    • 按照行内样式,id选择器个数,类选择器个数,标签选择器个数,(从左到右比较)

docs.title: 2.5 字体属性:
docs.text:
Info

说明

这部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/font.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

docs.title: 2.5.1 color:
docs.text:
• color
    • 各种颜色: 查表https://www.w3schools.com/colors/colors_names.asp
    • 色值:(茴香豆有4种写法,色值主要有3种写法)
    • RGB值:rgb(255,99,71),三个值分别对应rgb三个值,取值范围0-255
      • < p style="background-color:rgb(255, 99, 71)">html< /p>:

        rgb(255,99,71)

    • HEX值:#ff6347,和上面差不多,每两位表示RGB中的一个值,前面加上井号
      • < p style="background-color:#ff6347">html< /p>:

        #ff6347

    • RGBA值:rgba(255,99,71,1),rgba加上透明度(这个应该是可以的,但是jupyter不知道为什么会把style吞掉,如果%%html没问题,直接markdown不显示颜色)
      • < p style="background-color:rgba(255, 99, 71, 0.5)">< /p>:

        rgba(9, 100%, 64%, 0.5)

代码

CSS
div{color:red;}
div{color:#ff0000;}
div{color:rgb(255,0,0)}
div{color:rgba(255.0,0,.5)}

docs.title: 2.5.2 font-size
docs.text:
某些浏览器有最小字体大小

代码

CSS
div{font-size:10px;}

docs.title: 2.5.3 font-weight:
docs.text:
设置文本的粗细

  • bold:加粗
  • bolder:更粗
  • lighter:更细
  • 100-900:默认400,bold700

注: 其实如果自己引入字体的话,可以自定义,@font-face

Example

代码 HTML
#5 {font-weight:normal}
#6 {font-weight:bold}
#7 {font-weight:bolder}
#8 {font-weight:lighter}
#9 {font-weight:360}

docs.title: 2.5.4 font-style:
docs.text:
设置文本的字体样式

  • normal:默认
  • italic:斜体字

Example

代码 HTML
#10 {font-style:normal}
#11 {font-style:italic}

docs.title: 2.5.5 font-family:
docs.text: 用来指定一个元素的字体,如果字体名称包含空格,则必须用引号包裹

docs.title: 2.5.6 line-height:
docs.text:
设置文本间距,单倍间距或者双倍间距等

  • 数字px
  • 数据(几倍行距)

docs.title: 2.5.7 font:
docs.text:
把上面所有font属性写到一起

字号和字体值必须写,不然不生效

Info

说明

text部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/text.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

docs.title: 2.5.8 text-indent:
docs.text:
文本缩进

  • 数字px
  • 数字em(1em是当前标签的字号大小)

docs.title: 2.5.9 text-align:
docs.text: 内容对齐,默认是left,居中的是文字,不是标签

docs.title: 2.5.10 text-decoration:
docs.text:
加上修饰线

  • none;
  • underline
  • line-through
  • overline

代码

Python
div {
    # font-style, font-weight font-size line-height font-family
    font: italic 700 30px/2 楷体;
}

docs.title: 2.6 背景
docs.text:
Info

说明

这部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/background.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

docs.title: 2.6.1 background-color
docs.text: 和color一样,但是color是文字的颜色,bgc是背景的颜色

docs.title: 2.6.2 background-image
docs.text:
那个url()里面可以填本地地址,直接从本地访问图片,也可以直接url,

代码

HTML
.box{
    width: 600px;
    height: 600px;
    background-image: url("some url")
}

docs.title: 2.6.3 background-repeat:
docs.text:
设置图片如何重复:

  • repeat:默认属性,在分配的空间大于图片大小的时候会像两个方向重复图片
  • repeat-x:只在x方向上重复图片
  • repeat-y:只在y方向上重复图片
  • no-repeat:不重复图片

代码

HTML
.box{
    background-image:url("something");
    background-repeat:no-repeat;
}

docs.title: 2.6.4 background-size:
docs.text:
设置背景图片的大小

  • length:设置背景图片的宽度和高度,可以只设置一个值,另一个会默认成auto
  • percentage:设置图片占相对区域面积的百分比,可以只设置一个值,另一个会默认成auto
  • cover:将图片设置成能完全覆盖背景区域的最大大小
  • contain:保持图片和总比并且放缩成适合背景定位的最大大小

代码

HTML
.box{
    background-image: url("something");
    background-size 100% 100%;
}

docs.title: 2.6.5 background-position:
docs.text:
以下都是第一个位置为水平位置,第二个为垂直位置,英文字面意思,不要多想

  • left top
  • left center
  • left bottom
  • right center
  • right bottom
  • center top
  • center center
  • center bottom
  • x% y%
  • xpos ypos

代码

HTML
.box{
    background-image: url("something");
    background-position: left top;
}

docs.title: 2.6.6 background-attachment
docs.text: 使背景不会跟着元素移动

docs.title: 2.6.7 background复合:
docs.text: 把上面所有属性写到一起,空格隔开,不区分顺序

docs.title: 2.7文本属性
docs.text:
感觉好像font里也写了一遍,不过不管了

Info

说明

text部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/text.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

docs.title: 2.7.1 text-align
docs.text:
文本对齐方式,英文字面意思

  • left
  • right
  • center

代码

HTML
h1 {
    text-align:center
}

docs.title: 2.7.2 text-decoration:
docs.text:
添加到文本的修饰,下划线,上划线,删除线等,英文字面意思

  • underline
  • overline
  • line-through

代码

HTML
h1 {
    text-decoration:underline;
}

docs.title: 2.7.3 text-transform
docs.text:
还是英文字面意思

  • captialize
  • uppercase
  • lowercase

代码

Python
h1 {
    text-transform:uppercase;
}

docs.title: 2.7.4 text-indent:
docs.text:
定义缩进,直接是x px

代码

Python
h1 {
    text-indent:30px;
}

docs.title: 2.8 表格/边界属性
docs.text:
Info

说明

text部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/table.html,并确保阅读首页须知,本来想分开的,但是没了边界属性之外感觉表格就没东西了

docs.title: 2.8.1 border：
docs.text:
定义表格边框：

  • 边框距离
  • 边框样式
  • 边框颜色

代码

HTML
table,td{
    border: 1px solid black;
}

docs.title: 2.8.2 border-collapse:
docs.text:
设置边框是折叠成一个单一的边框还是隔开

代码

Python
table{
    border-collapse:collapse;
}

docs.title: 2.8.3 border-radius(这个一般不在表格中用)
docs.text:
创建圆角

  • 设置一个值:四个角圆角相同
  • 设置两个值:第一个为左上角和右下角,第二个值为右上角和左下角
  • 设置三个值:第一个为左上角,第二个为右上角和左下角,第三个是右下角
  • 设置四个值:第一个为左上角,第二个为右上角,第三个为左下角,第四个是右下角
Python
#border-radius1{
            width:200px;
            height:200px;
            background:violet;
            border-radius:20px;
        }

docs.title: 2.9 css盒子模型:
docs.text:
Info

说明

盒子部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/box_model.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

封装周围的html元素的整体框架

  • margin 外边距,透明的
  • border 边框
  • padding 内边距,透明的
  • content 实际内容,编辑weight和height的时候实际编辑的是content部分的大小

针对这几个有一堆的css属性,具体自己查https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/index.php

一般border属性都以border开头

常用的对于以上四个都适用的,英文字面意思

  • margin-top
  • margin-bottom
  • margin-left
  • margin-right
  • border-top
  • border-bottom
  • border-left
  • border-right
  • padding-top
  • padding-bottom
  • padding-left
  • padding-right

盒子大小

  • 默认:盒子大小= 内容尺寸 + border尺寸 + 内边距尺寸

margin不算进盒子

  • border和padding会撑大盒子
  • 解决:
  • 手动做减法
  • 内减模式: box-sizing:border-box

docs.title: 2.9.1 外边距问题:
docs.text:
子级添加margin会导致父元素塌陷

解决办法:

  • 取消自己margin,父级设置padding
  • 父级设置overflow:hidden
  • 父级设置border-top

docs.title: 2.9.2 行内元素内外边距问题:
docs.text:
行内元素添加margin和padding无法改变垂直位置

解决问题: 加line-height

docs.title: 2.9.3 清除默认样式:
docs.text:
比如p标签的空白,这里用全局选择器

代码

Text Only
* {
    margin: 0px;
    padding: 0px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

docs.title: 2.9.4 元素溢出:
docs.text:
用overflow控制,或者overflow-x,overflow-y

  • scroll : 无论是否溢出都有滚动条
  • hidden: 隐藏溢出部分
  • auto: 自动识别,溢出就加scroll

docs.title: 2.9.5 box-shadow
docs.text:
一共四个值:

  • h-shadow(必选):水平阴影的位置
  • v-shadow(必选):垂直阴影的位置
  • blur(可选):模糊距离
  • color(可选):阴影的颜色

代码

HTML
#box-shadow1{
            width:200px;
            height:200px;
            background:aqua;
            box-shadow: 10px 20px
        }

docs.title: 2.10 css弹性盒子
docs.text:
Info

说明

弹性盒子部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/flex-box.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

弹性元素由弹性容器和弹性子元素组成,通过设置display的属性将其定义为弹性容器

弹性盒子默认横向摆放

  • display:flex 启用弹性盒子,默认为水平排列

这种子元素可以自动基岩或拉伸

组成部分: - 弹性容器 - 弹性盒子 - 主轴: 默认在水平方向 - 侧轴: 默认在垂直方向

docs.title: 2.10.1 justify-content:
docs.text:
• flex-start: 默认值,从七点开始依次排列
  • flex-end: 弹性盒子从终点开始依次排列
  • center: 主轴居中
  • space-between: 均匀排列,空白在盒子中间
  • space-around: 均匀排列,空白在盒子两侧
  • space-evenly: 弹性盒子和容器之间间距相等

docs.title: 2.10.2 flex-direction:
docs.text:
• row 横向从左到右摆放
  • row-reverse 横向从右到左摆放
  • column 纵向从上到下排列
  • column-reverse 纵向从下到上排列

docs.title: 2.10.3 align-items:
docs.text:
• flex-start
  • flex-end
  • center

docs.title: 2.10.4 align-self:
docs.text: 单独控制某个弹性盒子的侧轴排列方式 - stretch: 沿着测轴拉伸至铺满容器 - center: 居中 - flex-start: 起点开始排列 - flex-end: 弹性盒子从终点开始依次排列

docs.title: 2.10.5 flex:
docs.text:
控制弹性盒子在主轴方向的尺寸

属性值: 政治素质,表示占用父级元素剩余尺寸的分数,默认是1

docs.title: 2.10.6 flex-grow:
docs.text:
设置扩展因子,会根据弹性盒子的扩展因子分配剩余空间

可以设置扩展因子让各个元素大小自动按比例分配

各个元素的比例=扩展因子+1

docs.title: 2.10.7 flex-wrap:
docs.text:
弹性盒子可以自动挤压或者拉伸,默认情况下,所有天哪星河在一行显示

  • wrap: 换行
  • no-wrap: 不换行(默认)

docs.title: 2.10.8 align-content
docs.text:
这个是不会对单行生效的,和align-itmes似乎是一个东西

  • flex-start: 默认值,从七点开始依次排列
  • flex-end: 弹性盒子从终点开始依次排列
  • center: 主轴居中
  • space-between: 均匀排列,空白在盒子中间
  • space-around: 均匀排列,空白在盒子两侧
  • space-evenly: 弹性盒子和容器之间间距相等

docs.title: 2.11.2.1 空格折叠
docs.text: 无论放多少个空格都会被折叠成一个空格

docs.title: 2.11.2.2 元素无间隙:
docs.text: 如果有两个并排的图片一起放置,中间是没有间隙的

docs.title: 2.11.2 解决:
docs.text:
脱离文档流:

  • 浮动
  • 绝对定位
  • 固定定位

docs.title: 浮动:
docs.text:
Info

说明

浮动部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/float.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

Info

说明

清除浮动部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/disable-float.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

float属性:(只有左右浮动,没有上下浮动),可以是元素拖了文档流

  • left(向左浮动)
  • right(向右浮动)

元素同时向一方向浮动的时候,会变成水平摆放,向左或者向右

当容器大小不足的时候会在下一行摆放

docs.title: 2.11.2.1 清除浮动:
docs.text:
清除浮动会导致某些元素的位置发生变化,后续元素会收到影响

比如如果父级元素没有高度,子级元素无法撑开父级高度

  • 父元素设置相应属性
  • 增加clear属性, clear:both
  • overflow清除浮动
  • 伪对象方式, 在父级对象加上一个::after或者::before选择器,设置clear:both

docs.title: 2.11.2.1.1 clear
docs.text:
• left(清除左浮动)
  • right(清除右浮动)
  • both(清除左右浮动,如果有的话)

docs.title: 2.11.2.1.2 overflow:
docs.text:
如果父元素出了问题,同级元素受到影响,可以用overflow清除浮动,这种情况下不能设置父元素的高度

  • visible(全部铺在页面上)
  • hidden(隐藏)
  • clip(把多的部分隐藏)
  • scroll(增加一个可滚动的轴,大小不调整)
  • auto(自适应)

docs.title: 2.12 定位:
docs.text:
Info

说明

position部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/position.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

position属性

  • relative
  • absolute(脱离文档流)
  • fixed(脱离文档流)

可以使用left,top,right,bottom四个属性调整位置

对于absolute可以理解成每一个absolute的元素都在一个新的图层上(子绝父相)

fixed一般来说不会有这个问题,因为fixed元素会跟着页面滚动

设置定位后定位随着能定位的父元素决定,直到顶层文档

定位方式 属性值 是否脱离标准流(文档流) 显示模式 参照物 相对定位 relative 否 保持标签原有显示模式 自己原来的位置 绝对定位 absolute 是 行内块特点 已经定位的祖先元素或者浏览器可视区 固定定位 fixed 是 行内块特点 浏览器窗口

docs.title: 2.12.1 z-index:
docs.text: 解决图层问题,后来者居上,取值越大越靠上

docs.title: 2.13 transition:
docs.text:
和@keyframes 差不多, 语法上也差不多

  • 可以在一个元素不同状态之间切换的时候添加过渡效果
  • transition: 过渡属性,花费时间
  • 注意:
  • 过渡属性可以是具体的css属性
  • 也可以设置为all,所有不同的属性值都产生过渡效果
  • transition设置给元素本身
  • 一般和伪对象选择器一起使用,设置不同状态

docs.title: 2.14 opacity:
docs.text: 设置整的元素的透明度,0-1

docs.title: 2.15 SEO:
docs.text:
尽量让网页在搜索引擎里靠前,一般企业里会用

方法:

  • 氪金
  • 网页后缀设置为html
  • 标签语义化(在合适的地方使用合适的标签)

网页SEO标签

  • title: 网页标题标签 < head>里的< title>
  • description:网页描述 < head>里的< meta name="description">
  • keywords: 网页关键词 < head>里的< meta name="keywords">

docs.title: 2.16 Favicon图标:
docs.text:
出现在浏览器标题栏的图标

代码

HTML
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="文件名" type="image/x-icon">

说明

tranlates部分所有效果可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/translates.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

docs.title: 2.17.1.1 平移:
docs.text: transition和translate实现

docs.title: 2.17.1.2 旋转效果:
docs.text:

CSS
transform: rotate(角度)

https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/transform-function/rotate

代码

CSS
transform-origin: 水平位置 垂直位置

docs.text:
代码

CSS
transform: translate() rotate()

transform属性有层叠性,不能一个一个写,必须写进一个transform属性里

background-image linear-gradient(
    渐变方向(角度或者to),
    颜色1, 终点位置(可不写)
    颜色2, 终点位置(可不写)

https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/gradient/linear-gradient

    半径 at 圆形位置(x位置 y位置),

    颜色2, 终点位置(可不写)

docs.title: 2.17.2.1 平移:
docs.text:
代码

CSS
transform: translate3d(x,y,z); /*这里必须逗号隔开*/
transform: translateX();
transform: translateY();
transform: translateZ();

默认z是没有效果的,但是可以给父级元素设置视距

docs.text:
perspective: 视距

添加给直接父级元素

docs.text:

CSS

transform: rotateY(值);
transform: rotateZ(值);

CSS
transform: rotate3d(x,y,z,角度); /*x,y,z是0-1之间的数字*/

CSS
transform-style: 属性
  • flat: 子级处于平面中
  • preserve-3d: 自己处于3D空间

CSS
transform: scale3d(x,y,z);

docs.title: 2.18 动画:
docs.text:
用@keyframes创建动画,这个会一直重复播放

属性太多了,建议自己查表https://www.w3schools.com/css/css3_animations.asp

同时要在对应的元素上加animation属性

代码

CSS
animation: 动画名称 动画时长 速度曲线 延迟时间 重复次数 动画方向 执行完毕时状态

比如

代码

CSS
#breath:hover{
    animation: breath 2700ms ease-in-out 0s infinite alternate running;
}

或者拆成多个属性值去写 - animation-name - animation-duration - animation-delay - animation-fill-mode - forwards: 最后一帧状态 - backwards: 第一帧状态 - animation-timing-function - linear - ease-in-out - step() - ... - animation-iteration-count - infinite - 数字 - animation-direction - alternate为反向 - animation-play-state - paused为暂停

代码

CSS
@keyframes rainbow{
                0%{
                    height:25px;
                    width:25px;
                    background-color:red;
                }
                16%{
                    height:50px;
                    width:50px;
                    background-color:orange;
                }
                33%{
                    height:75px;
                    width:75px;
                    background-color:yellow
                }
                50%{
                    height:100px;
                    width:100px;
                    background-color:green
                }
                67%{
                    height:125px;
                    width:125px;
                    background-color:aquamarine;
                }
                83%{
                    height:150px;
                    width:150px;
                    background-color:blue
                }
                100%{
                    height:175px;
                    width:175px;
                    background-color:purple;
                }
            }

docs.title: 2.19 兼容不同设备:
docs.text:
• 分辨率:
  • 物理分辨率: 出厂设置,电脑显示屏分辨率
  • 逻辑分辨率: 调节之后的的分辨率

其实一般来说我更倾向写个scss,里面封装一下vh和vw函数,不过这个是在vue里

docs.title: 2.19.1 视口:
docs.text:
代码

HTML
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

这个大概率不用动,vscode自动生成

上述代码表示

  • 视口宽度=设备宽度
  • 缩放一倍(不缩放)

docs.title: 2.19.2 二倍图:
docs.text:
• 移动端参考iPhone6/7/8,设备宽度375px产出设计稿
  • 二倍图设计稿尺寸: 宽750px

docs.title: 2.19.3 适配方案:
docs.text:
• 宽度适配:宽度自适应,pc端网页
  • 百分比布局
  • flex布局
  • 注意:这两个不能高度自适应
  • 等比适配:宽高等比缩放,移动端网页
  • rem
  • vw

docs.title: 2.19.4 rem:
docs.text: rem是个相对单位,表示1HTML字号大小,是相对HTML标签字号计算出的单位

docs.title: 2.19.5 vw vh
docs.text: 也是相对单位,相对试图的尺寸的计算结果,50vw表示50%视图宽

docs.title: 2.19.6 媒体查询:
docs.text:
Info

说明

自行查看examples/css_involved/html/media-search.html,并确保阅读首页须知

检测视口的宽度,编写差异化的css, 如果用rem调整大小,只需要固定html字号即可

先设置< meta>

用@media创建媒体查询,在不同屏幕大小下设置不同比例

代码

HTML
@media screen and (max-width:768px) and (min-width:996px){
                #box{
                    background-color:aqua;
                }
                #p{
                    display:none;
                }
            }

可自行查看examples/css_involved/html/flexible.html,并确保阅读首页须知,不然太乱了

docs.title: 2.19.7.1 px转rem
docs.text:
一般设计稿是375px视口,

所以\(rem = \frac{px}{根字号}\)

减少图片大小,减少http请求,提高性能

通过把图片设置到background-image里调整位置可以把一堆图片整合进一张,需要用哪个就调整到哪个的位置

Python
#icon{

docs.title: 2.20 less
docs.text:
css的扩展,使css具备一定的逻辑性计算能力

存放在 .less文件中,网页要引入对应的css,因为浏览器不支持less

VScode的插件Easy less,应该也有别的插件能做到,不过先用这个

docs.title: 2.20.1 注释:
docs.text:
单行注释: //

多行注释和css一样

记什么记,ctrl+/

docs.title: 2.20.2 支持运算:
docs.text:
加减乘除直接写计算表达式

除法要么用括号括起来,要么用 ./

如果运算中出现多个单位值,最后只会以一个单位为准

docs.title: 2.20.3 嵌套
docs.text:
可以生成后代选择器

代码

LessCss
.father{
    color: red;
    .son{
        color: green;
    }
}

用&表示当前元素,相当于this

同时可以写&:hover实现伪对象选择器

docs.title: 2.20.4 变量:
docs.text:
• 定义变量: @变量名:数据;
  • 使用变量: CSS属性: 变量名;

docs.title: 2.20.5 导入:
docs.text:
代码

LessCss
@import '文件路径';

如果是less文件可以省略后缀

docs.title: 2.20.6 导出:
docs.text:
文件第一行写

代码

LessCss
// out 路径

docs.title: 2.20.6.1 禁止导出:
docs.text:
对于某些通用属性,我们不希望他们生成css

代码

LessCss
// out:false

docs.title: 1.1 基本结构
docs.text:
Example

代码效果 HTML
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>网页</title>
    </head>
    <body>
        某个网页
    </body>
</html>

请自行查看 examples/basic_html_stuff/basic_skeleton.html, 并确保阅读首页须知

docs.title: 1.2 标签
docs.text: 主要分为单标签和双标签 - 双标签< html>< /html> - 单标签< img>

docs.title: <!DOCTYPE html>声明(必须有且只有第一行是这个)
docs.text: 声明这个文档是一个html

docs.title: 1.2.1.1 < html>< /html>(必须有且仅有一个)
docs.text: 定义html文档

docs.title: 1.2.1.2 < head>< /head>(必须有且仅有一个)
docs.text: 定义头文件,定义超参数

docs.title: 1.2.1.3 < body>< /body>(必须有且仅有一个)
docs.text: 定义元素的主体,是直接能在网页里看到的东西

docs.title: 1.2.1.4 < title>< /title>(必须在< head>中出现)
docs.text: 定义这个网页的名称,

docs.title: 1.2.1.5 < meta>(可以没有)
docs.text:
描述一个html的属性,关键词等,比如< meta charset = "UTF-8">

具体参数看这里:https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_meta.asp

Example

代码效果 HTML
%%html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>网页</title>
        <meta charset = "UTF-8">
    </head>
    <body>
        某个网页
    </body>
</html>

请自行查看 examples/basic_html_stuff/meta.html, 并确保阅读首页须知

docs.title: 1.2.2.1 < h>< /h>
docs.text:
用于定义标题,从h1到h6

  • 选择位置: 增加align属性, align = "left"|"center"|"right"

Example

代码效果 HTML
%%html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>网页</title>
    </head>
    <body>
        某个网页
        <h1 align = "center">标题1</h1>
        <h2 align = "left">标题2</h2>
        <h3 align = "right">标题3</h3>
        <h4>标题4</h4>
        <h5>标题5</h5>
        <h6>标题6</h6>
    </body>
</html>

请自行查看 examples/basic_html_stuff/h.html, 并确保阅读首页须知

docs.title: 1.2.2.4  < hr>
docs.text:
水平线

属性(其实都是通用属性)

  • color:设置水平线的颜色
  • width:设置水平新的长度
  • size: 设置水平线的高度
  • align: 对齐方式

代码效果 HTML

<html>

docs.title: 1.2.2.6 < img>
docs.text:
用来显示图片

属性:

  • src:图片地址,可以是网址
  • alt:在图片加载不出来的时候现实的文字
  • title:图片标题,鼠标位于图片上是会显示的文字
  • height:图片高度
  • width:图片宽度

Example

代码效果 HTML
%%html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>网页</title>
    </head>
    <body>
        <img src="https://prts.wiki/images/ak.png?8efd0" alt="测试图片" width="100" height="100" style="color:red;background-color:powderblue">
        <img src="https://prts.wi_ki/images/ak.png?8efd0" alt="测试图片" width="100" height="100" style="color:red">
    </body>
</html>

请自行查看examples/basic_html_stuff/img.html,并确保阅读首页须知,

docs.title: 1.2.2.7 < a>
docs.text:
用来实现链接

属性

  • href: 跳转的网页链接，如果不定义这个和文字没有区别

Example

代码效果 HTML
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Page Title</title>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
    </head>
    <body>
        <a href="https://prts.wiki/w/%E5%B9%B2%E5%91%98%E4%B8%80%E8%A7%88" style="color:red;background-color:powderblue">
            <img src="https://prts.wiki/images/ak.png?8efd0" alt="测试图片" width="100" height="100" style="color:red;background-color:powderblue">
        </a>
    </body>
</html>

请自行查看examples/basic_html_stuff/a.html,并确保阅读首页须知,

docs.title: 1.2.2.8 文本标签类:

Info

说明

这部分整合在examples/basic_html_stuff/text.html中,需要请自行查看,并确保阅读首页须知

docs.title: 1.2.2.8.1 < b>

        <div>这是不用p的样式</div>

docs.title: 1.2.2.8.5 < span>
docs.text:
元素没有特定的含义,如果不加样式的话(其实多数html都只是相当于封装了一个类让css可以选择而已)

代码

HTML
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Page Title</title>
    </head>
    <body>
        <span style="text-align:center" title="example">段落1</span>
        <p style="text-indent:30px;color:red">段落2</p>
        <div>这是不用p的样式</div>
    </body>
</html>

Example

代码整合 HTML
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Page Title</title>
    </head>
    <body>
        <p>p:段落1</p>
        <br>
        <b>b:段落1</b>
        <br>
        <span>span:段落1</span>
        <br>
        <em>em:段落1</em>
        <br>
        <i>i:段落1</i>
        <br>
        <del>段落1</del>
        <br>
        <strong>段落1</strong>
    </body>
</html>

• src: 通过设置src属性设置播放的音频
  • controls: 默认是controls,显示控制面板
  • loop: 循环播放
  • autoplay: 自动播放,但是浏览器会禁用

docs.title: 1.2.2.14 < table>< /table>
docs.text:
• 表格:< table>< /table>
    • 属性:
      • border:表格边框
      • width:表格宽度
      • height:表格高度

    • 行:< tr>< /tr>
    • 单元格(列):< td>< /td>
    • 表头单元格: < th>< /th>
  • 表格区域:
    • thead表头
    • tbody表格主体
    • tfoot表格底部

docs.title: 1.2.2.14.1 合并单元格
docs.text:
合并方案: - 水平合并:colspan - 垂直合并:rowspan

Example

代码效果 HTML
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Page Title</title>
    </head>
    <body>
        <p>合并21和22:rowspan</p>
        <p>合并35和45:colspan</p>
        <p>合并41,42,51,52:rowspan + colspan</p>
        <br>
        <table border="1" width="600px" height="400px">
            <tr>
                <td>11</td>
                <td>12</td>
                <td>13</td>
                <td>14</td>
                <td>15</td>
            </tr>
            <!-- 原先是这样的
            <tr>
                <td>21</td>
                <td>22</td>
                <td>23</td>
                <td>24</td>
                <td>25</td>
            </tr>
            -->
            <tr>
                <td colspan="2">21&22</td>
                <td>23</td>
                <td>24</td>
                <td>25</td>
            </tr>
            <!-- 原先是这样的
            <tr>
                <td>31</td>
                <td>32</td>
                <td>33</td>
                <td>34</td>
                <td>35</td>
            </tr>
            -->
            <tr>
                <td>31</td>
                <td>32</td>
                <td>33</td>
                <td>34</td>
                <td rowspan="2">35</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td rowspan="2" colspan="2">41</td>
                <td>43</td>
                <td>44</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>53</td>
                <td>54</td>
                <td>55</td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>
</html>

请自行查阅example/basic_html_stuff/table.html,并确保阅读首页须知

docs.title: 1.2.2.15 < form>< /form>
docs.text:
(学了vue 和 element-plus 之后感觉不太需要这个)

用于创建可以提交的表单

  • action:网址
  • name:表单名称, get|post,因为要提交表单,所以自然不是delete那些

表单内的元素用< input>< /input>表示

一般来说表单包含以下三个组成部分

  • 表单标签
  • 表单域
  • 表单按钮

Example

    <input type="text">请输入东西

docs.title: 1.2.2.16 < input>< /input>
docs.text:
学了vue之后比较常用,直接v-model和变量绑定

  • type: 定义input种类:
  • text: 文本框
    • placeholder: 定义提示词
  • password: 密码框
    • placeholder: 定义提示词
  • radio: 多选框
    • name: 划分组,同一组当中只会有一个被选择
    • checked: 控制选中
  • checkbox: 单选框
    • checked: 控制选中
  • file: 上传文件

Example

代码效果 HTML
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
</head>
<body>
    <input type="text">
    <input type="checkbox">
    <input type="number">
    <input type="password">
    男<input type="radio" name="gender">
    女<input type="radio" name="gender">
</body>
</html>

请自行查看[example/basic_html_stuff/input.html]

        <option>1</option>
